<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For a non-constant amount or a large amount, we have to probe.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AllocaAmount &lt; 0 || AllocaAmount &gt; StackProbeSize)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If it fits within the safe region of the stack, just subtract.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurrentOffset + AllocaAmount &lt;= StackProbeSize)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Sub;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, touch the current tip of the stack, then subtract.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TouchAndSub;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note: we don&#39;t know the offset at the start of the entry block since the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// prologue hasn&#39;t been inserted yet, and how much that will adjust the stack</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
